alert.note: Alert for Adams; Clay (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 09 at 8:11PM CDT by NWS Hastings
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Clay and east central Adams Counties through 900 PM CDT... At 811 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Inland, or 9 miles east of Hastings, moving southeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Glenvil around 820 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Harvard, Clay Center and Fairfield. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
